11.content:
It is 5:30 in the morning, and you just woke up. You do what you do everyday. You rinse your face, put on your clothes, eat your breakfast, brush your teeth, comb your hair, then you head out to the bus stop. It was a real cold day outside, but it was too late to get a jacket. You walked up to the grand old tree and started waiting. It took 10 minutes for the bus driver to get to her destination. When the door opened, all you could see was her figure. She had blonde hair, long nails, and some shades on. Then you entered the bus.

There were 3 sections you had to cross before you got to your seat. The first one was the kid's section. You were passing by some 3rd, 4th, and 5th graders and they gave you a weird look. There were these middle schoolers in the kid's section that you despised so much. Their names were Jessica and Kayla. They look nice, but evil in the inside. Then you came to the middle section. Here were the bad middle school kids. Then you passed by a bad gang. There was Nani, Melody, and Brittney. You finally got to your seat were all the highschool kids were. You sat in the very back behind two fat nerd chicks. So it was a normal day. But then you got sleepy for 5 mins. and you shrunk! What are you going to do now?
